languages.text: Данное устройство, похоже, в нарушение всех канонов эксплуатации подключено к энергетической системе гробницы и питает технику в лагере.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Судя по устройствам, члены экспедиции пытались подключиться к энергоядру гробницы и перенаправить энергию на нужды лагеря. И, судя по отсутствию других элементов питания в лагере, им это удалось.

languages.text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.
languages.original_text: Данное устройство, похоже, в нарушение всех канонов эксплуатации подключено к энергетической системе гробницы и питает технику в лагере.

traits.locale_text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and powering up the equipment in the camp, violating all operational canons.
This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and powering up the equipment in the camp, violating all operational canons.
This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and powering up the equipment in the camp, violating all operational protocols.
This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and powering up the equipment in the camp, violating all operational protocols.
This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.
This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.

languages.text: Cet appareil semble relié au système énergétique de la crypte pour alimenter l'équipement du camp, une infraction à tous les protocoles de fonctionnement.
languages.original_text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.

traits.locale_text: Cet appareil semble être relié au système énergétique de la crypte pour alimenter l'équipement du camp, une violation de tous les protocoles de fonctionnement.

languages.text: Este dispositivo parece estar conectado al sistema energético de la cripta y transmitirlo al equipamiento del campamento, en una violación de todos los cánones operativos.
languages.original_text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.

traits.locale_text: Este dispositivo parece estar conectado al sistema energético de la cripta y transmitirlo al equipamiento del campamento, en una violación de todos los protocolos operativos.

languages.text: 这台装置似乎与这个墓穴的能量系统相连，为营地里所有的设备供电，与所有的操作圣典格格不入。
languages.original_text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.

traits.locale_text: 这台装置似乎与这个墓穴的能量系统相连，为营地里所有的设备供电，与所有的操作规程格格不入。

languages.text: この装置は墓所のエネルギーシステムに接続され、キャンプ内の機器に電力を供給しているようだ。あらゆる運用規範に反している。
languages.original_text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.

traits.locale_text: この装置は墓所のエネルギーシステムに接続され、キャンプ内の機器に電力を供給しているようだ。あらゆる運用規範に反している。

languages.text: Dieses Gerät scheint mit dem Energiesystem der Krypta verbunden zu sein und die Ausrüstung im Lager mit Energie zu versorgen — was gegen alle Betriebsgebote verstößt.
languages.original_text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.

traits.locale_text: Dieses Gerät scheint mit dem Energiesystem der Krypta verbunden zu sein und die Ausrüstung im Lager mit Energie zu versorgen — was gegen alle Betriebsprotokolle verstößt.

languages.text: Bu cihaz, mahzenin enerji sistemine bağlıymış gibi duruyor ve tüm işlevsel nizamnameleri ihlal ederek kamptaki ekipmanlara güç veriyor.
languages.original_text: This device seems to be connected to the energy system of the crypt and is powering the equipment in the camp, in violation of all operational canons.
